Title: Final Take: The Golden Age of Movies
Writer: Yoshitaka Asama, Hisashi Inoue, Taichi Yamada, Yôji Yamada
Actors: Kiyoshi Atsumi, Kiichi Nakai, Narimi Arimori, Chieko Baishô
Plot: This is Japanese melo-dramatist director Yoji Yamada's ode to 1930s film production during the transition from silent film to talkies. With many loose associations we can see the rise of a ...
